content: ✅ Ph.D. in Applied Mathematics & Statistics | 2 yrs postdoc + 2 yrs biotech startup + 3 yrs wet-lab (synthetic barcoding–based in vivo lineage tracing) ✅ Skills: Bayesian optimization, machine learning (deep generative model), data analysis & visualization, Python (NumPy, pandas, Matplotlib, Flet), Git, SQL ✅ Strong analytical and critical thinking; detail-oriented, highly organized, goal-driven
